# Extendicare Maintenance Inspection Checklist## Equipment
**Kitchen Range Hood**### LEGEND/KEY
| Legend | Key         |
|--------|-------------|
| W      | Weekly      |
| M      | Monthly     |
| Q      | Quarterly   |
| S      | Semi-Annual |
| A      | Annual      |
| O      | Ok          |
| R      | Repair      |
| N      | Replace     |### CHECKS
| W | M | Q | S | A | Item                                                                 |
|---|---|---|---|---|----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1. Check that filters are in place and clean. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 2. Inspect the interior for grease accumulation on the fan side of filters. Clean as required. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 3. Arrange cleaning of the entire system, hood, duct work and fan unit, as required.

|
|   | X |   |   |   | 3. Arrange cleaning of the entire system, hood, duct work and fan unit, as required. * |**NOTE:**
*Qualified service firms are to be employed.### Monthly Schedule
| Month | M | Q | S | A |
|-------|---|---|---|---|
| JAN   | W | W | W | W |
| FEB   | W | W | W | W |
| MAR   | W | W | W | W |
| APR   | W | W | W | W |
| MAY   | W | W | W | W |
| JUN   | W | W | W | W |
| JUL   | W | W | W | W |
| AUG   | W | W | W | W |
| SEP   | W | W | W | W |
| OCT   | W | W | W | W |
| NOV   | W | W | W | W |
| DEC   | W | W | W | W |----**Helping people live better.**This document is uncontrolled when printed.
